name: guSh
description:
Become an interplanetary vigilante and survive as long as you can on each planet!

The galaxy is under attack by an evil alien species, the swappers, that are replacing some of the planet's inhabitants in pursuit of planetary domination. Help guSh, the interplanetary vigilante survive 60 seconds on each planet to plant a beacon so the ship's AI can lock on it and abduct the swappers.

guSh is an action platformer game where the player has to survive climbing on different platforms to escape death.

guSh introduces a procedurally generated platform system making each play through different from the previous one along with a vast variety of unique weapons with well-designed functions and feel.

This, together with different enemies, scenarios and play styles, gives guSh an innovative value.

The game is easy to learn and hard to master, which makes it enjoyable both to casual/novice gamers and the more hardcore ones, since it emulates the gameplay elements of retro arcade games, having few and simple mechanics that allow a huge combinations of dynamics allowing the players to hone their skills in pursuit of the highest score.
